description: Retrieves the details of the specified speaker search task.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource to be updated. Valid values include the ID and ARN of the media insights pipeline.

parameters.name: SpeakerSearchTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSearchTask
nested_items.description: The details of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSearchTaskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a speaker search task was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a speaker search task was updated.
